title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official CLI and Go library for downloading, running, and managing large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama, letting you chat with local models in a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with the Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that wraps Ollama models as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI (formerly Ollama WebUI) that talks to any local model via Ollama.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering synchronous, asynchronous, and reactive APIs.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem for chatting with Ollama models from Ruby scripts and Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Cross-platform TUI client written in Rust for interactive chats with Ollama models.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by Ollama to use local models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community-curated recipes showing how to integrate Ollama with Python, Go, Rust, Docker, etc.

title: ollama-nim
summary: Nim wrapper for Ollama’s REST API enabling native Nim applications to chat with local models.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Official .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with sync/async and streaming APIs.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling options.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a portable CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI microservice template that exposes Ollama endpoints with JWT auth and rate-limiting.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that lets you run local LLM prompts inside your notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client for Ollama with comptime JSON parsing and cross-platform HTTP support.
